explanation: [0-0] In an outdoor setting, a woman in a pink sari stands on the left, holding a broom in her right hand and looking down at the ground. A man in a yellow shirt and red pants is perched on a low wall to the left. Another man in a black shirt and red pants is lying on a table on the right, his legs dangling from a beautifully designed and ornate window. Above the window, there is a hexagonal decoration. White English subtitles "Part 133" appear on a black background at the top.
